1: כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יְרַחֵ֨ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>will have mercy</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>on Jacob</n> וּבָחַ֥ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>and will yet choose</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>and again</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וְהִנִּיחָ֖ם <sup>3240 </sup> <n>and set</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>their own</n> אַדְמָתָ֑ם <sup>127 </sup> <n>them in their own land</n> וְנִלְוָ֤ה <sup>3867 </sup> <n>shall be joined</n> הַגֵּר֙ <sup>1616 </sup> <n>and the strangers</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וְנִסְפְּח֖וּ <sup>5596 </sup> <n>with them and they shall cleave</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to the house</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n>
2: וּלְקָח֣וּם <sup>3947 </sup> <n>shall take</n> עַמִּים֮ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And the people</n> וֶהֱבִיא֣וּם <sup>935 </sup> <n>them and bring</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מְקוֹמָם֒ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>them to their place</n> וְהִֽתְנַחֲל֣וּם <sup>5157 </sup> <n>shall possess</n> בֵּֽית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> אַדְמַ֣ת <sup>127 </sup> <n>them in the land</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>for servants</n> וְלִשְׁפָח֑וֹת <sup>8198 </sup> <n>and handmaids</n> וְהָיוּ֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will take</n> שֹׁבִ֣ים <sup>7617 </sup> <n>and they shall take them captives</n> לְשֹֽׁבֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>7617 </sup> <n>whose captives</n> וְרָד֖וּ <sup>7287 </sup> <n>they were and they shall rule</n> בְּנֹגְשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <sup>5065 </sup> <n>over their oppressors</n> ס
3: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will be in</n> בְּי֨וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in the day</n> הָנִ֤יחַ <sup>5117 </sup> <n>shall give thee rest</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> לְךָ֔ מֵֽעָצְבְּךָ֖ <sup>6090 </sup> <n>from thy sorrow</n> וּמֵרָגְזֶ֑ךָ <sup>7267 </sup> <n>and from thy fear</n> וּמִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הָעֲבֹדָ֥ה <sup>5656 </sup> <n>bondage</n> הַקָּשָׁ֖ה <sup>7186 </sup> <n>and from the hard</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עֻבַּד־ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>wherein thou wast made to serve</n> בָּֽךְ׃

8: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Even</n> בְּרוֹשִׁ֛ים <sup>1265 </sup> <n>Yea the fir trees</n> שָׂמְח֥וּ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>rejoice</n> לְךָ֖ אַרְזֵ֣י <sup>730 </sup> <n>at thee [and] the cedars</n> לְבָנ֑וֹן <sup>3844 </sup> <n>of Lebanon</n> מֵאָ֣ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>for</n> שָׁכַ֔בְתָּ <sup>7901 </sup> <n>[saying] Since thou art laid down</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יַעֲלֶ֥ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>is come up</n> הַכֹּרֵ֖ת <sup>3772 </sup> <n>no feller</n> עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n>
